mdRecord.dcterms:title: Ancient Roman vaginal speculum (replica)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Replica of an ancient Roman vaginal speculum from the first century A.D. Most likely a replica of a variation of instrument number 293 cataloged in the following source: Bliquez, L.J. (1994) Roman surgical instruments and other minor objects in the National Archaeological Museum of Naples. Manz, von Zabern. Donated to the University of Virginia by members of the 8th Evacuation Hospital Unit of the United States Army.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medicine, Greek and Roman
Medical instruments and apparatus
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
